alert.note: Alert for Marion; Ralls (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 7:47PM CDT until August 29 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Pike County in west central Illinois... Southwestern Adams County in west central Illinois... Northeastern Ralls County in northeastern Missouri... Southeastern Marion County in northeastern Missouri... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 747 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hannibal, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hannibal around 750 PM CDT. Fall Creek around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include New London. This includes the following highways... Interstate 172 between exits 2 and 10. Interstate 72 between exits 4 and 10. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
